pages.text: A method to remove heavy materials from water. When constructed, the tower will slowly and passively generate various resources (can only run when empty output, use a hopper!!). The resource lootable depends on the water of a location (biome). $(li)Oceans $(li)Deserts $(li)Rivers and Swamps $(li)Caves $(li)Elsewhere

Construction notes: $(li)The inside is filled with fluid. $(li)The walls are made from any #forge:sheetmetals. $(li)More layers of sheet metal and fluid can be added to increase processing speed (max of 20). $(br2)By default, the sheetmetal in the tower will occasionaly break.
